reviewText:
(This review has been updated due to an update the game has received)

A cute puzzle game that I think relies on either quick reflexes on occasion or maybe luck/skill.

I'm not sure it would take people to look twice but it is quite obvious that this game is mobile port but that is no worries as long as the game is fun and it features PC specific stuff right?

There are resolution options (which also includes a Windowed mode), there are also options to change the music and sounds and 9 different language options.

The first world of the game basically acts as a tutorial and shows the player what they can interact with, after that there are a few other worlds to unlock and play. There is also an Infinite level that uses Steam's leaderboards to save your score.

The most offensive thing about this game is probably no resolution options and the wasted space due to the vertical game but it is still fun to play.

reviewText:
This is nothing but a poorly ported mobile game, and to make matters worse, it's quite a poor mobile game, at that.

The user interface is terrible (clearly just lazily converted from touch to mouse), which means that even if you wanted to play the game, because you are a masochist, doing so is not going to be easy.

The game itself is boring and unoriginal, which is a shame, because I think they could have done something much more interesting with their theme. Instead, we get a cookie cutter puzzle" game where the theme is just slapped on top of a set of generic game mechanics."

reviewText:
Kind of challenging.. but more because of ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥t rather than actual challenging gameplay.
Sometimes luggage will bounce off/out of the correct tube and into the wrong one.. when there was only one path to get to the right tube.  Another play on same level would not result in the same outcome because of the angle the luggage fell..
That's not my idea of replay value" lol.

Seems like a mobile port.. even in the trailer it's a finger doing the playing.

Another gripe I have with the game.. redundant scoring system (stars) and no option to skip a level.
So the level I quit on was 1:15 minutes long.  I failed two luggages (1 star left).  Time runs out so I lose.
Literally impossible to 1 star that level because missing two luggages makes you not have enough time to complete
date:
so I'd have to play it again and again just to move on..
/nope

If you REALLY like puzzle games
recommended:
then go for it.. if you were looking for a "casual" puzzle game to mess around in and have a little fun.. pass.

Gameplay video:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=y5yPlk4GTAY"

reviewText: Cute and well drawn game, colors very vibrant, well animated. Puzzle element a bit simplistic on the surface, but throws you for a loop as you progress deeper into the game!
